description.en: A modern e-commerce platform with real-time inventory, payment processing, and analytics dashboard
description.id: Platform e-commerce modern dengan inventori real-time, pemrosesan pembayaran, dan dashboard analitik

description.en: AI-powered content generation tool using GPT-4 for marketing copy, blog posts, and social media
description.id: Tool generasi konten berbasis AI menggunakan GPT-4 untuk copy marketing, blog, dan media sosial

description.en: Cross-platform mobile app for workout tracking, nutrition planning, and progress analytics
description.id: Aplikasi mobile cross-platform untuk tracking workout, perencanaan nutrisi, dan analitik progres

description.en: Property management dashboard with listing management, tenant tracking, and financial reporting
description.id: Dashboard manajemen properti dengan manajemen listing, tracking penyewa, dan laporan keuangan

description.en: Comprehensive analytics platform for tracking social media performance across multiple platforms
description.id: Platform analitik komprehensif untuk tracking performa media sosial di berbagai platform

description.en: Netflix-style streaming platform with adaptive bitrate, user profiles, and recommendation engine
description.id: Platform streaming bergaya Netflix dengan adaptive bitrate, profil pengguna, dan mesin rekomendasi
